Text: Enukpa ki alule̩ ef e̩do̩-foo-wñ nyo̩ tʼe̩ne̩ kʼo̩la uko-wñ chʼe̩dalo̩ kʼi ño̩ chʼake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ le.
Omune̩ de̩ ge̩, kʼonugo one̩ ki we ema e̩wñ i nyo̩ n,
E̩wñ idada one̩ agwʼona-wñ ji,
E̩wñ ene̩ nana aje̩ ñw amonuku wewe,
Ma awe ebʼudu ñw e̩nibenu o̩lemi n,
Abo ku ma bi e̩numo̩la ki li ma eju awewe,
Amo̩maye e̩nukpa chaka achʼulaka-wñ;
E̩ne̩ ki atene ibe afe̩do̩ onugo o̩la-wñ;
Ma awe ebʼudu ñw e̩nibenu o̩lemi n,
Eli ura cheju ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ n,
Ibe kʼone̩ ne̩ aje̩ ñw u che̩du ewe̩do̩,
Uwe̩do̩ onu acho̩ko̩ dabe̩ne̩ kʼukwa idu,
O̩ma ki ake̩do̩nʼo̩la-wñ chʼuchobi ñw ata-wñ,
Unyi kpai e̩wñ anana chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼone̩ aje̩ ugbo ata-wñ,
Ejudo̩o̩ akpʼone̩ olu,
E̩ne̩ ki ade uko̩ ku ma te̩ le̩, mak onugo o̩la-wñ i ade le̩;
E̩ne̩ ki ali ame̩nubie̩ ejumomi, mak e̩wñ i ame̩ ñw Jihofa le̩,
Kʼo̩ma-we̩ o̩la ejugbogbo abu ki dʼugbo kʼe̩ kibeno ka kʼi arida;
E̩ne̩ e̩do̩fulu tabale agba udu-wñ;
Ne̩tirʼo̩la ku ma lo kʼe̩ la gba o̩la ku ma kʼuwe̩,
Ibe ojoji ojoji e̩ñwa wewe je̩f e̩do̩ one̩,
E̩wñ ki je̩ ñw ma ñeju one̩ chʼufe̩de̩nyo̩-wñ,
Ebʼe̩gahi Jihofa chʼiñmi;
E̩nejudo̩o̩ adʼo̩wo̩ tunyʼugba,
E̩ kpa e̩ne̩ ki ake igbe oñ e̩nemo̩ ako̩che̩ ugbeju;
E̩ne̩ ki achʼata-wñ afuma ki la fʼiye-wñ ne̩
O̩ma-mi, we o̩la ku ma kʼone̩ egbo̩ tak e̩ na bʼo̩la e̩wñ ema te̩.
E̩nibenu e̩bili akeru ajo̩ o̩kpakpa eka,
Ma fʼajo̩ ñwate̩ todu abo ku ma ake,
